title: Creating Awareness among Public Officers on Disaster Management
decision_details: - Disaster management is not an activity for s single institution or an organization but a responsibility which needs the contribution of both the public and private organizations inclusive of the general public. As such, the proposal made by Hon. Anura Priyadharshana Yapa, the Minister of Disaster Management, to implement an awareness programme on disaster mitigation for officers of the District Secretariats, Divisional Secretariats, Local Government Institutions, Samurdhi Officers, the Schools and the entrepreneurs making use of the resource persons serving in the public and the non-governmental organizations having expertise knowledge in the field of disaster management, was approved by the Cabinet.
